clause_text: ………………………………..Ward…………………………………, I regret to inform you that the sanction is refused on the following grounds under Section 346 of the Mumbai Municipal Corporation Act, 1888, and under Section 45/69 of the Maharashtra Regional and Town Planning Act, 1966. Municipal Corporation of Greater Mumbai. Office No. ………………………… Municipal Corporation Act, 1888] Form of Notice for Start of Work
